description: Data was extracted from {---tag-release---} of the active GDC archive from GDC on {---tag-release-month-year---} for {---tag-program---} copy number segment data. More details: https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Data/Release_Notes/Data_Release_Notes/#{---tag-release-url-anchor---}
friendlyName: {---tag-program---} HG38 COPY NUMBER SEGMENT ALLELIC {---tag-release---} VERSIONED

fields.description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; e.g. TCGA-OV, etc.
fields.name: project_short_name

fields.description: Original TCGA case barcode, eg TCGA-DX-A8BN
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: Anatomical site of the cancer under investigation or review
fields.name: primary_site

fields.description: Chromosome, possible values: chr1-22, and chrX
fields.name: chromosome

fields.description: The sum of the Major and Minor Copy Numbers
fields.name: copy_number

fields.description: The Copy Number of the more prevalent allele set in the dataset for the genomic region
fields.name: major_copy_number

fields.description: The Copy Number of the less prevalent allele set in the dataset for the genomic region
fields.name: minor_copy_number

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this case (corresponds to the case_barcode).  Can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this:   https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/files/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba10
fields.name: case_gdc_id

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this sample (corresponds to the sample_barcode), eg a1ec9279-c1a6-4e58-97ed-9ec1f36187c5  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: sample_gdc_id

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this aliquot (corresponds to the aliquot_barcode), eg 7fbfdb3e-1fd2-4206-8d2e-7f68e4a15844  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: aliquot_gdc_id

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this file (corresponds to the file_barcode)  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this: https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/files/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba17
fields.name: file_gdc_id
